item.title: Agentic AI is changing online meeting platforms: Moving from silent observer to active participant
item.description: Agentic AI is changing online meeting platforms and now thanks to Otter AI and other leading vendors it’s poised to change it even more.

item.title: Security teams can respond 80% faster to events with Cyberhaven’s AI-powered data lineage tools
item.description: The security platform built specific large lineage models (LLiMs) to track data lifecycles across users and endpoints and detect shadow AI.

item.title: From alerts to autonomy: How leading SOCs use AI copilots to fight signal overload and staffing shortfalls
item.description: SOCs are seeing false positive rates drop 70%, while shaving 40+ hrs a week of manual triage thanks to the rapid advances in AI copilots.

item.title: Midjourney’s surprise: new research on making LLMs write more creatively
item.description: There's still a lot of juice left to be squeezed, cognitively and performance-wise, from classic Transformer-based, text-focused LLMs.

item.title: DeepSeek-V3 now runs at 20 tokens per second on Mac Studio, and that’s a nightmare for OpenAI
item.description: DeepSeek's free 685B-parameter AI model runs at 20 tokens/second on Apple's Mac Studio, outperforming Claude Sonnet while using just 200 watts, challe...
